headline: How to piss off a bullfrog
text: Just in time for Saint Patrick's Day, a touch of green comes to the Caturday morning video smile! Today's Caturday morning video smile is an unexpected gem. It features an African bullfrog, Pyxicephalus adspersus, and his boy. African bullfrogs are very large amphibians, with adult males weighing in at more than 2 kilos (4.4 pounds). These animals are voracious carnivores that eat anything that can be stuffed into the mouth.
